scripts.build: pnpm --filter './main' build && rm -rf ./build && mv main/build . && pnpm --filter './talks/*' build
scripts.build-previewpage: pnpm --filter './main' build && rm -rf ./build && mkdir -p "./build/${BASE_PATH}" && mv main/build "./build/${BASE_PATH}" && pnpm --filter './talks/*' build-previewpage
